{
  "insights": [
    "No LLM response led to a wait action; no progress or profit change.",
    "System lacks resilience to provider timeouts/unavailability.",
    "No alerting/observability caused latent stall detection.",
    "Default 'wait' needs a safe operational fallback."
  ],
  "memory_additions": [
    "Set LLM request timeout to 30s and retry 3x with exponential backoff.",
    "Add fallback to a secondary model/provider on timeout/error.",
    "Trigger alert if no LLM response within 5 minutes.",
    "Log LLM request/response metadata and errors for observability.",
    "Run a connectivity/auth check to LLM at start of each day.",
    "Use last known good plan to execute minimal safe actions if LLM down.",
    "Schedule resilience improvements as top priority next work block."
  ],
  "risk_flags": [
    "Single point of failure: reliance on one LLM provider.",
    "Lack of monitoring/alerts for stalled pipelines.",
    "Opportunity cost from idle time due to waits.",
    "Potential credential/quota issues going unnoticed.",
    "Process drift if 'wait' action repeats without mitigation."
  ],
  "next_day_hypotheses": [
    "Timeouts and retries will cut stall frequency and improve throughput.",
    "Fallback provider will maintain operations during primary outages.",
    "Alerting will enable intervention within minutes, reducing idle time.",
    "Daily connectivity checks will catch auth/network issues early."
  ]
}
